vote.title: Authorize (1) a public hearing to be held on Wednesday, September 21, 2022 to receive comments on a proposed tax rate; and (2) a proposal to consider adoption of a $0.7458 per $100 valuation tax rate, or a lower rate as may be proposed by City Council for the 2022-23 fiscal year on Wednesday, September 21, 2022 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize (1) a public hearing to be held on Wednesday, September 21, 2022 to receive comments on a proposed tax rate; and (2) a proposal to consider adoption of a $0.7458 per $100 valuation tax rate, or a lower rate as may be proposed by City Council for the 2022-23 fiscal year on Wednesday, September 21, 2022 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
